property.name: SQL
SQL
property.value: select count(1) from (select * from tl_stat_otherec_mtinfo a, (select vc2ecid,vc2shortname from tl_otherec_info group by vc2ecid, vc2shortname) b, tl_operator c where a.vc2ecid = b.vc2ecid and a.numopid = c.numopid #0# order by vc2month) t

property.name: queryOtherDataByIdSql
property.value: select a.vc2month, a.vc2ecid, b.vc2shortname, a.vc2servcode, a.numopid, c.vc2name, a.numsvctype, decode(a.numsvctype, '1', '短信', '2', '彩信') vc2svctype, a.nummtcnt, a.nummtsuccnt, a.datinsert from tl_stat_otherec_mtinfo a, tl_otherec_info b, tl_operator c where a.vc2ecid = b.vc2ecid and a.numopid = c.numopid and a.vc2ecid = '{0}' and a.vc2servcode = '{1}' and a.vc2month = '{2}' and a.numsvctype = {3} and a.numopid = {4}

property.name: queryOtherECByECIdSql
property.value: select * from tl_otherec_info where vc2ecid = '{0}' and vc2validflag = '1'

property.name: SQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from( select numseqid, vc2ecid, vc2ecfullname, vc2shortname, vc2ismas, vc2industry, vc2custype, vc2gwtype, vc2status, vc2opname, vc2servcode, vc2manager, numcuslevel, vc2feemode, vc2subcode, vc2conperson, vc2contact, numlimit, numfeearea, numbusarea, vc2svc, vc2feetype, vc2feerule, vc2putintime, vc2gwputin, vc2gwfeerule, vc2validflag, vc2signname,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY from TL_OTHEREC_INFO A ,TL_BRANCHCOMPANY_LIST B where A.NUMBUSAREA = B.NUMBRANCHCOMPANY And VC2VALIDFLAG = '1' #0# order by numseqid desc ) adsfsds where rownum < {0}+{1}+1 ) where numrowasdf > {0}

property.name: SQL
property.value: select count(1) From TL_OTHEREC_INFO A ,TL_BRANCHCOMPANY_LIST B where A.NUMBUSAREA = B.NUMBRANCHCOMPANY And VC2VALIDFLAG = '1' #0#

property.name: queryOtherECNameByECIdSql
property.value: select vc2ecid, vc2ecfullname, vc2shortname from tl_otherec_info where vc2validflag = '1' and vc2ecid = '{0}' group by vc2ecid, vc2ecfullname, vc2shortname

property.name: updateOtherECNameByECId
property.value: update tl_otherec_info set vc2ecfullname = '{1}', vc2shortname = '{2}' where vc2ecid = '{0}'
